scaled_traces.description: Input scaled traces data for the detection model

model_outputs.description: Expected output from the detection model

processing_notes: Use first 1000 frames to calculate inference scaling with inference_scaling.onnx
Process first 2000 frames (10 windows of 200) to get first 1200 outputs (10 windows of 120) with detect.onnx
Input to detect.onnx should be: (traces - median) * input_scale * inference_scaling
